Package: com.android.build.gradle

[Groovy] Class BasePlugin

    • com.android.build.gradle.BasePlugin

    • Base class for all Android plugins

      • Nested Class Summary

          Nested classes 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static class  BasePlugin.PostCompilationData Class to hold data to setup the many optional post-compilation steps.

        • void createPackagingTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull ApkVariantData variantData, org.gradle.api.Task assembleTask, boolean publishApk)

          Creates the final packaging task, and optionally the zipalign task (if the variant is signed)

          Parameters:
          variantData
          assembleTask - an optional assembleTask to be used. If null a new one is created. The assembleTask is always set in the Variant.
          publishApk - if true the generated APK gets published.

        • void createPostCompilationTasks(@com.android.annotations.NonNull ApkVariantData variantData)

          Creates the post-compilation tasks for the given Variant. These tasks create the dex file from the .class files, plus optional intermediary steps like proguard and jacoco

          Parameters:
          variantData - the variant data.

        • void createProcessJavaResTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData)

        • void createProcessResTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData, boolean generateResourcePackage)

        • void createProcessResTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String symbolLocation, boolean generateResourcePackage)

        • protected void createProcessTestManifestTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String manifestOurDir)

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull void createProguardTasks(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData, @com.android.annotations.Nullable BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> testedVariantData, @com.android.annotations.NonNull BasePlugin.PostCompilationData pcData)

          Creates the proguarding task for the given Variant.

          Parameters:
          variantData - the variant data.
          testedVariantData - optional. variant data representing the tested variant, null if the variant is not a test variant
          Returns:
          outFile file outputted by proguard

        • void createRenderscriptTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData)

        • void createSplitAbiTasks(@com.android.annotations.NonNull ApplicationVariantData variantData)

        • void createSplitResourcesTasks(@com.android.annotations.NonNull BaseVariantData<? extends BaseVariantOutputData> variantData)

          Creates the split resources packages task if necessary. AAPT will produce split packages for all --split provided parameters. These split packages should be signed and moved unchanged to the APK build output directory.

          Parameters:
          variantData - the variant configuration.

        • void createTestApkTasks(@com.android.annotations.NonNull TestVariantData variantData)

          Creates the tasks to build the test apk.

          Parameters:
          variantData - the test variant

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull ZipAlign createZipAlignTask(@com.android.annotations.NonNull String name, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File inputFile, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File outputFile)

          creates a zip align. This does not use convention mapping, and is meant to let other plugin create zip align tasks.

          Parameters:
          name - the name of the task
          inputFile - the input file
          outputFile - the output file
          Returns:
          the task

          Calculate the list of folders that can contain jni artifacts for this variant.

          Parameters:
          variantData - the variant
          Returns:
          a potentially empty list of directories that exist or not and that may contains native resources.

        • protected PrepareLibraryTask handleLibrary(@com.android.annotations.NonNull org.gradle.api.Project project, @com.android.annotations.NonNull LibraryDependencyImpl library)

          Handles the library and returns a task to "prepare" the library (ie unarchive it). The task will be reused for all projects using the same library.

          Parameters:
          project - the project
          library - the library.
          Returns:
          the prepare task.

          Parameters:

          path - the proposed path name
